name: Blocklo
description:
--Description--

Move around the infinite grid and collect points!

 But watch out! Some squares will take away points so be sure to avoid them! Collect points and avoid the blank squares to survive...

--Developers Note--

This is a small mobile game I made in a week (I know its a long time for this small of a game but I'm proud of it).

The Web build might not work quite right.

--Controls--

Click/Tap around the player to move.

WASD Keys on Windows/MAC/Linux
